title: 1.7.10加速火把
author: 皮皮一
txt_content: 怎么把加速火把里面的压缩加速火把启用。版本看标题。帮一下忙谢谢大佬

replies.author: 543344255x
replies.txt_content: 最新版本的加速火把有压缩加速火把之类的东西，你可以在config里找到它的配置文件（.minecraft/config/sci4me/Torcherino.cfg）打开后找到# Are compressed Torcherinos enabled? [default: false]这一项  在下面的B:compressedTorcherino=设为true  解锁压缩   Are double compressed Torcherinos enabled? Automatically enables compressed Torcherinos. [default: false]这项下一行设为true 解锁超级压缩

replies.author: Kruls
replies.txt_content: 你看下是这个嘛，没玩过加速火把里面的超级压缩的加速火把怎么开启 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-796883-1-1.html (出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)https://www.mcmod.cn/item/46408.html

replies.author: 543344255x
replies.txt_content: 给个最佳答案吧，我都省的你翻网页了

replies.author: 皮皮一
replies.txt_content:
